scenario_1.persona_desc: A functional programmer who is interested in the theory of species and the application of them to analyze datatypes. They are looking for a deeper understanding of the functional programming perspective on species and how they can be used to analyze datatypes. They are also interested in the category theory involved and the construction of categories from species. They are looking for a practical application of species in their work and are eager to learn more about the different operations and properties of species.

responses.thought: I will choose the option that gives me the most money, which is Right. Although A gets more, I still get $400, which is the same as in the Left option.
